Pre-Game Insights: While the Faroe Islands only lost their advantage on Saturday due to a cheap penalty, they were under the cosh for large periods and could have easily been put to the sword on another day.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Latvia host the Faroe Islands in League C Group 4.
Latvia's only success during the Nicolato era so far coincidentally came against none other than the Faroe Islands, whom they overcame 1-0 in the Baltic Cup third-placed playoff.
Others: Janis Ikaunieks, the highest active scorer in the 11 Wolves ranks with 12 goals to his name, was forcibly withdrawn in the 82nd minute.
The Faroe Islands stole a highly creditable point off a side ranked 66 places higher than them.
